Mexico - Second Industrial Equipment Fund
            (FONEI) Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Industrial Equipment Fund
            (FONEI) Project provides for the financing of fixed assets
            of specific export-oriented and efficient
            import-substitution projects with potential to export.
